name: ejaculating

ejaculate
ejaculate verb
(SPERM)
[ I or T ] (of a man or male animal), to produce a sudden flow of semen from the penis

ejaculate verb
(SAY)
[ T ] old-fashioned or humorous to shout or say something suddenly: [ + speech ] "You've got my umbrella!" he ejaculated.
